page.title: 04TRADE
page.content: There are many shops in Hoyland.The shops are in the centre of Hoyland. Most people do their shopping in the {supermarkets}.Other shops include butchers,newsagents,greengrocers,baker furniture,frozen foods,electrical,pet, Post Office,decorating and chemist. People also travel to Chapel town, Barnsley and Wombwell because there is more variety and so many things are cheaper in larger supermarkets.There are many local shops that serve the housing estates.There is an open {market}on Tuesdays and Saturdays selling such things as wool,toys,fruit and vegetables,shoes,baby clothes, antiques,carpets and plants.There are seven fish and chip shops.
